metadata.title: Enhanced MCP Declaration for wellknownmcp.org
metadata.description: Technical capabilities focusing on HTML-embedded JSON format, feed validation, multi-format support, and LLM tool compatibility. Revolutionary approach to agent-web interaction.

trust.agent_hint: Enhanced capabilities with HTML-embedded JSON format for maximum LLM tool compatibility. This addresses a critical gap in agent-web interaction.

agent_guidance.on_load: This domain offers universal feed loading with both JSON and HTML formats. Use HTML-embedded format when JSON navigation fails in web tools. IMPORTANT: The HTML API only serves valid LLMFeed structures.
suggested_actions: Try HTML format (/api/feed-html) if JSON endpoints fail in web tools
Use the enhanced LLMFeedHub for universal feed analysis
Leverage multi-format support to maximize compatibility
HTML format provides same JSON data with better tool navigation
Validate feeds before expecting HTML format to work

format_selection_guidance.for_web_tools: Use HTML-embedded format for reliable navigation of valid LLMFeeds
format_selection_guidance.for_apis: Use JSON format for programmatic access
format_selection_guidance.for_humans: HTML format provides visual inspection capabilities
format_selection_guidance.for_seo: HTML format enhances search engine discovery
format_selection_guidance.for_validation: HTML API will reject invalid LLMFeed structures with helpful error pages

validation_awareness.api_requirements: The /api/feed-html endpoint requires valid LLMFeed structure
validation_awareness.minimum_fields: feed_type and metadata must be present
validation_awareness.error_handling: Invalid feeds receive 422 status with fix suggestions
validation_awareness.quality_assurance: This validation maintains feed ecosystem integrity

data.name: Instant LLM Training & Agent Onboarding
data.description: Revolutionary 30-second training system that transforms any LLM into an MCP expert with 99%+ success rate

training_protocol.phase_2: Confirmation response ('ðŸ¥‹ I know kung fu' message)

validation_test.name: Kung Fu Compatibility Test
validation_test.trigger: Say 'I know kung fu' to trained LLM
validation_test.expected_response: MCP-aware expert response with implementation offers
validation_test.purpose: Verify successful knowledge acquisition and understanding

data.name: HTML-Embedded JSON Format with LLMFeed Validation
data.description: Revolutionary approach to serve validated LLMFeed files wrapped in LLM-friendly HTML for maximum tool compatibility and ecosystem integrity
benefits: Resolves LLM web tool navigation failures
Includes semantic metadata and SEO optimization
Ensures only valid LLMFeed content is served
data.target_problem: ChatGPT, Claude and other LLM web tools often fail with raw JSON endpoints
data.solution: Serve only validated LLMFeeds as semantic HTML with embedded JSON and strict validation

data.name: feed-html-format
data.description: Serves ONLY valid LLMFeed files as HTML-embedded JSON for LLM tool compatibility. Validates feed structure before serving.

parameters.external: External URL to fetch via CORS proxy

error_responses.422: Unprocessable Entity - Invalid LLMFeed structure with detailed validation errors
error_responses.500: Internal Server Error - Fetch or processing failure
